title: Can we speak during Adhan & Iqamah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: from the uk he says that is it permissible to speak while the evan is being called or the akama is being called the answer is yes there's nothing authentic that prohibits it is it the best thing to do of course not the best thing is to to listen and repeat and then say that this application that would qualify you to receive the intercession of the prophet sallallahu alaihi wasallam on the day of judgment but if you continue to speak or work or write or read while the adhan is being called there is no sin on yunnan whatsoever
